title: Pesticides and transformation products in surface waters of western Montérégie, Canada: occurrence, spatial distribution and ecotoxicological risks
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3VA00231D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiameng Feng, Zhen Liu, Sung Vo Duy, Gabriel Munoz, Lise Parent, Sébastien Sauvé
The ecotoxicological risk of pesticides was assessed for the surface waters of western Montérégie, one of the most important agricultural areas in Quebec, Canada.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
